author: sussman
msg: Continue work on issue #648:  an fs dump/load format.
* fs_dumprestore.txt (Node-action): tweak format spec a bit more.
* svn_repos.h (svn_repos_dump_fs):  take a svn_repos_t, not a svn_fs_t.

author: philip
msg: Fix issue 543. Remove conflict files when update restores a locally
removed file.  Also, while I'm here, make svn_wc_resolve_conflict
handle directories and update the .svn/entries file.
svn_wc_resolve_conflict to remove any text conflict.
resolve_text and resolve_props flags. Handle directories. Update
the entries file when removing the conflict.
for update to resolve text conflicts.
conflict. Add testing for file and directory props resolution.

author: kfogel
msg: (random_test): Cruisin' a little too fast through those format
strings, are we?  Fix miscorrection from revision 1836, leer
suggestively at Greg Stein for having the temerity to notice.

author: cmpilato
msg: (svn_wc_copy_and_translate): Don't bail out of '$' handling just
(lines): Add some new lines to the test data.
(substitute_and_verify): Modify to test the new data lines.

author: kfogel
msg: (svn_hash_read): Accept another way of ending a property hashdump.
